data.name: dashAvatarCheck
data.value: Check users avatar

data.name: dashAvatarCheckD1
data.value: When you enable this option, Bitguard regularly scans the avatars of server members and checks their similarity with the server icon. Particularly in cases such as crypto IPOs, fraudsters often try to impersonate the server and therefore avatar similarity detection is of great importance.

data.name: dashAvatarCheckD2
data.value: Bitguard uses advanced algorithms to detect avatar similarity and increases the security of your server when this feature is enabled. If the profile photos of server members are highly similar to the server icon, Bitguard will warn you and help you take necessary precautions.

data.name: dashAvatarCheckD3
data.value: This feature provides a more sensitive approach to fraud attempts while protecting the security of your server.

data.name: dashBadWords
data.value: List of Restricted Words:

data.name: dashBadWordsD1
data.value: You can use this field to create a list of words you want to prohibit on your server. Add each word/words separated by commas. Bitguard will use this list to scan and provide warnings when users send messages that contain these words. This feature is customized for anti-scam purposes and can also be used to encourage the community to use appropriate and respectful language if desired.

data.name: dashBadWordsReset
data.value: free, discount, campaign, sale, gift, promotion, raffle, opportunity, guarantee, traffic increase, special offers, limited offers, easy money, debt payment, investment opportunity, online income, earn money fast, job offer, offers, zero risk , 0 risk, risk-free, win now, free reward, quick wealth, unlimited earnings, instant confirmation

data.name: dashBadWordsWarn
data.value: Warning Message:

data.name: dashBadWordsWarnD1
data.value: In this field, enter the warning message you want to display to users when inappropriate words are used. The warning message will inform users to adhere to the rules and avoid using inappropriate words. This is an effective way to maintain order within your community.

data.name: dashBadWordsWarnReset
data.value: **Warning**: Suspicious message content has been detected. If any fraud attempt or fraud attempt is detected, necessary legal action and reporting processes will be initiated. Please be vigilant and report any suspicious activity to contribute to the safety of our community.

data.name: dashNoServer
data.value: YOU DO NOT HAVE ANY SERVERS THAT YOU MANAGE AS AN ADMINISTRATOR

data.name: dashNtfChannel
data.value: Notification Channel

data.name: dashNtfChannelD1
data.value: To ensure that your moderators are promptly and effectively informed in various critical situations (e.g., suspicious activity alerts), notifications are sent to this channel. It is recommended to select a channel that only authorized personnel can access. This channel plays a critical role in the security and order of your server.

data.name: dashReset
data.value: Reset

data.name: dashSaveChanges
data.value: Save Changes

data.name: dashSelectServer
data.value: Select Server

data.name: dashSpamBlock
data.value: Spam Blocker

data.name: dashSpamBlockD1
data.value: When you enable this option, Bitguard automatically monitors and filters spam content on your server. This helps keep your server clean and organized, preventing spam content from harming your community.

data.name: dashSpamBlockD2
data.value: When this option is enabled, messages sent on your server are continuously scanned. Repeated phrases are blocked, and the user is muted with a warning sent via private message. Additionally, a message is sent in the notification channel for administrators to take action.

data.name: dashSpamBlockD3
data.value: This feature allows you to enjoy your community without spending more time dealing with unwanted content. It helps enhance your community's experience and makes your server safer without requiring additional time and resources to combat unwanted content.

data.name: dashSusCheck
data.value: Periodically Check the List of Suspected Users Across Servers.

data.name: dashSusCheckD1
data.value: When this option is enabled, users who have been flagged as suspicious in other servers protected by Bitguard are detected in your server. This helps enhance the security of your server because when suspicious users from other servers enter your server, Bitguard recognizes and marks them. This allows you to respond to potential threats more quickly and effectively.

data.name: dashSusCheckD2
data.value: This feature allows Bitguard to enhance security measures based on inter-server cooperation, contributing to a safer community.

data.name: dashTitle
data.value: Dashboard

data.name: errorD
data.value: AN ERROR HAS OCCURED

data.name: errorGoMain
data.value: GO TO THE HOMEPAGE

data.name: errorTitle
data.value: Error

data.name: faqD1
data.value: Bitguard is a bot specially designed for use on Discord servers. It offers various features such as server security, fraud prevention, and spam control.

data.name: faqD10
data.value: If you have more questions or issues, please reach out to us via the "Contact" button located at the bottom right of the website. We're here to assist you and would be happy to help.

data.name: faqD2
data.value: To add Bitguard to your server, visit the official website and follow the instructions.

data.name: faqD3
data.value: The free version includes basic security features, while the premium version offers additional features and advanced security. The premium version provides more customization options and support.

data.name: faqD4
data.value: Bitguard can be used on any server that complies with Discord's rules.

data.name: faqD5
data.value: Bitguard scans the members on your server, monitors suspicious behavior, filters out objectionable content, and performs moderation actions when necessary.

data.name: faqD6
data.value: Bitguard updates automatically, so you don't need to perform manual updates.

data.name: faqD7
data.value: Bitguard takes various security measures to detect potential threats and protect users.

data.name: faqD8
data.value: You can configure Bitguard according to the needs of your server. After logging in to the website, you can make customizations in the "My Servers" section.

data.name: faqD9
data.value: To support Bitguard, visit the official website and explore options for making donations or using the premium version.

data.name: faqQ1
data.value: What is Bitguard?

data.name: faqQ10

data.value: What kind of operations does Bitguard perform on my server?

data.name: faqQ6
data.value: How do I update Bitguard?

data.value: How does Bitguard protect my server?

data.name: faqQ9
data.value: How can I support Bitguard?

data.value: Frequently Asked Questions

data.name: indexD
data.value: Bitguard is ready to secure your server! It continuously scans members and messages, swiftly detects suspicious behavior, and takes the necessary actions. It's specially equipped to combat scams. Add Bitguard now to help your community have a safer Discord experience!

data.name: pd1
data.value: Omvio&Daniasu operates the www.bitguard.com website, which provides the SERVICE.

data.name: pd10
data.value: We want to inform our Service users that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

data.name: pd11
data.value: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

data.name: pd12
data.value: Our Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

data.name: pd13
data.value: Our Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal identifiable information from children under 13. In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to do necessary actions.

data.name: pd14
data.value: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, we advise you to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately, after they are posted on this page.

data.name: pd15
data.value: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.

data.name: pd2
data.value: This page is used to inform website visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service, the Bitguard website.

data.name: pd3
data.value: If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation with this policy. The Personal Information that we collect are used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

data.name: pd4
data.value: The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at www.bitguard.com, unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

data.name: pd5
data.value: For a better experience while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your name, phone number, and postal address. The information that we collect will be used to contact or identify you.

data.name: pd6
data.value: We want to inform you that whenever you visit our Service, we collect information that your browser sends to us that is called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol ("IP") address, browser version, pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, and other statistics.

data.name: pd7
data.value: Cookies are files with small amount of data that is commonly used an anonymous unique identifier. These are sent to your browser from the website that you visit and are stored on your computer's hard drive.

data.name: pd8
data.value: Our website uses these "cookies" to collection information and to improve our Service. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies, and know when a cookie is being sent to your computer. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.

data.name: pd9
data.value: We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:

data.name: premAllPrem
data.value: In the beta version, all users have premium privileges.

data.name: premD
data.value: Take your server's security to the next level by gaining unlimited access to all of BitGuard's features

data.name: premDataSecurity
data.value: Personal Data Protection

data.name: premDataSecurityD
data.value: User data privacy is important. Bitguard has been designed with sensitivity to protect your personal data and takes measures to prevent its misuse.

data.name: premGetPrem
data.value: Get Premium

data.name: premInterserverNet
data.value: Inter-Server Network

data.name: premInterserverNetD
data.value: Our bot checks whether users have exhibited suspicious behavior in other servers using Bitguard. If a user has been flagged as suspicious elsewhere, this information is relayed to the moderators

data.name: premInvite
data.value: Add to Discord

data.name: premMsgScan
data.value: Message Scan

data.name: premMsgScanD
data.value: Messages on your server are scanned. These scans help us quickly detect harmful content or unwanted behaviors. Phishing links, websites used for scams, and other negative content are automatically filtered, and necessary measures are taken

data.name: premQuarantine
data.value: Quarantine

data.name: premQuarantineD
data.value: Members displaying suspicious behavior are restricted within your server and kept in a special quarantine channel. This measure aims to maintain the overall security of your server and allows for immediate intervention. Members are moved to the quarantine area, ceasing their actions, and issues are reported to moderators. This approach provides moderators with the opportunity to review the behavior of the suspect and make decisions.

data.name: premScamDetect
data.value: Spam and Threat Detection

data.name: premScamDetectD
data.value: Bitguard recognizes spam messages and potential threats on your server and removes these messages from the view of users. This helps keep your server clean and organized.

data.name: premServerCount
data.value: Servers Secured

data.name: premSusCaught
data.value: Suspects Caught

data.name: premTitle
data.value: Premium

data.name: premUserNtf
data.value: User Notifications

data.name: premUserNtfD
data.value: You receive instant notifications about users displaying suspicious or malicious behavior. This allows moderators to intervene quickly and resolve potential issues.

data.name: premUserScan
data.value: Member Scanning

data.name: premUserScanD
data.value: Members on your server are continuously scanned, and their behavior is monitored. Bitguard identifies members who potentially exhibit dangerous or suspicious behavior.

data.name: privacyTitle
data.value: Privacy
